tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE warranty_and_service_history (
  appliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  appliance_name STRING,
  purchase_date DATE,
  warranty_period INT,
  service_history STRING
)

CREATE TABLE ApplianceDetails (
    appliance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    brand TEXT,
    model TEXT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    warranty_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (warranty_id) REFERENCES WarrantyInfo(appliance_id)
);

CREATE TABLE warranty_info (
    warranty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    appliance_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    warranty_provider VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE warranty_info (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  appliance_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  serial_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  purchase_date DATE NOT NULL,
  warranty_period INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE appliance_details (
  appliance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  appliance_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  brand VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  model_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  year_of_manufacture INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE customer_info (
  customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  customer_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  customer_phone VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  address TEXT
);
